name: User Control Panel (LS-V)
text: User Control Panel for a multiplayer game, where the players can login, register, view and manage their characters. Full-stack developed including email confirmations, security check and more. (Source Code is private)

name: Randome
text: Stores a collection of randomizers and allow users to create, view, like and favorite different randomizers made by the community.

name: Web Developer Portfolio
text: A static web page to showcase my skills and projects.

name: Family Overseer
text: Task management website to help families assign and keep track of family-related tasks.

name: Blizzard Api Reader
text: An Open Source client for the Blizzard public Web API. (Developed in C#)
